messages.message: Hey team. I have some bittersweet news to share. I will be leaving Instabase soon (last day is the 18th). I've loved working with all of you so much, and I think you are some of the best folks at Instabase. My last day is the 18th, so please do put some time on my calendar so we can chat more if you wish. @jack.robbins and @Serena are well versed in all my ongoing work so we should not miss any steps :slightly_smiling_face:. Will be rooting for you from the sideline!
thank you for all of your hard work, and best wishes for your next adventure! :heart:
